file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 76-12-03-04 - FADEC POWER-SUPPLY DIODE BOX - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FADEC POWER-SUPPLY DIODE BOX - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to remove/install the FADEC Power-Supply Diode Box. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FADEC POWER-SUPPLY DIODE BOX - ALL 76-12-03-000-801-A REMOVAL FADEC POWER-SUPPLY DIODE BOX - ALL 76-12-03-400-801-A INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 76-12-03 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 76-12-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. FADEC POWER-SUPPLY DIODE BOX - REMOVAL A. General (1) Obey the instructions below to remove the FADEC Power-Supply Diode Box. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 - AMM SDS 24-60-00/1 HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200 LG SAFETY PIN - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL SB145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 123 221CF Cockpit floor 114 114BZ Forward electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On aircraft PRE-MOD SB145-32-0036, make sure that the pressure in hydraulic system No. 1 is fully released ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 76-12-03 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) On aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, install the safety pin of the NLG door solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). (3) Make sure that the landing-gear safety pins are installed ( AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200). (4) Open access panel 114BZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100) to get access to the backup battery relay box. (5) Remove floor panel 221CF (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100) to get access to the power- supply diode box. (6) Open these circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them: – FADECs 1A, 1B, 2A, 2B on the circuit breaker panel. – FADEC A BUS, FADEC B BUS on the backup-battery relay box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1). – FADEC A BUS on the LH power control/distribution box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1). – FADEC B BUS on the RH power control/distribution box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disconnect the power-supply diode-box electrical connectors (4). (2) Remove bolts (2) and washers (3). (3) Remove the power-supply diode box (1) from its place. (4) Install plugs/caps to the disconnected points. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 76-12-03 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL FADEC Power-Supply Diode Box - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 123 DET. A B 1. POWER SUPPLY DIODE BOX 2. BOLT (3) 3. WASHER (3) 4. CONNECTOR (2) DET. B 145AMM760045.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 76-12-03 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 76-12-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. FADEC POWER-SUPPLY DIODE BOX - INSTALLATION A. General (1) Obey the instructions below to install the FADEC Power-Supply Diode Box. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 - AMM SDS 24-60-00/1 SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL SB145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 123 221CF Cockpit floor 114 114BZ Forward electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Remove the protective plugs and caps from the connectors. (2) Put the power-supply diode box (1) in position. (3) Install washers (3) and bolts (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 76-12-03 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Connect the electrical connectors (4). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close access panel 114BZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) Install floor panel 221CF (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100). (3) On aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, remove the safety pin of the NLG-door solenoid valve(AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). (4) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tags and close these circuit breakers: – FADECs 1A, 1B, 2A, 2B on the circuit breaker panel. – FADEC A BUS, FADEC B BUS on the backup-battery relay box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1). – FADEC A BUS on the LH power control/distribution box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1). – FADEC B BUS on the RH power control/distribution box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 76-12-03 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
